statements: SELECT * FROM singers_progress;
SELECT singer_id, name, progress FROM singers_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT name, achievements FROM singers_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT singer_id, name, progress, achievements FROM singers_progress WHERE singer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM singers_progress WHERE name LIKE '%son%';
SELECT * FROM singers_progress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, achievements FROM singers_progress WHERE singer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM singers_progress ORDER BY progress ASC, name ASC;
SELECT singer_id, name, achievements FROM singers_progress WHERE progress BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM singers_progress WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND achievements IS NOT NULL;
SELECT singer_name FROM singers WHERE performance_rating > 90;
SELECT * FROM singers ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT singer_name, performance_rating FROM singers WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM singers WHERE singer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT achievement_title, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE singer_id = 1;
SELECT singer_name, performance_rating FROM singers WHERE performance_rating > 8 ORDER BY singer_name DESC
SELECT singer_name, start_date FROM singers WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'

SELECT singer_name, achievement_title, achievement_date FROM singers INNER JOIN achievements ON singers.singer_id = achievements.singer_id WHERE achievements.achievement_date <= '2019-06-30' ORDER BY achievement_date ASC

SELECT singer_name, performance_rating, achievement_title FROM singers LEFT JOIN achievements ON singers.singer_id = achievements.singer_id WHERE achievements.achievement_title IS NULL ORDER BY singer_name
SELECT singer_name, start_date FROM singers WHERE singer_name LIKE '%a%' AND start_date > '2018-01-01' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT * FROM singers_progress WHERE performance_score > 80
SELECT singer_id, name FROM singers_progress ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, performance_score FROM singers_progress WHERE singer_id = 3
SELECT singer_id, review_date FROM performance_review WHERE review_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_title LIKE '%Record%'
SELECT singer_id, name FROM singers_progress WHERE performance_score > 90 ORDER BY singer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM performance_review WHERE singer_id = 101 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT singer_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY singer_id HAVING total_achievements > 3
SELECT * FROM singers_progress WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' AND review_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT achievements.achievement_title, singers_progress.name FROM achievements JOIN singers_progress ON achievements.singer_id = singers_progress.singer_id
SELECT * FROM SingersProgress;
SELECT singer_name, progress_report FROM SingersProgress WHERE singer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT singer_name, performance_rating FROM SingersProgress WHERE performance_rating > 90;
SELECT review_id, review_date, reviewer_name FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE singer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SingersProgress;
SELECT singer_name, progress_report FROM SingersProgress ORDER BY singer_name DESC;
SELECT singer_id, performance_rating FROM SingersProgress WHERE performance_rating > 80;
SELECT singer_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM SingersProgress JOIN Achievements ON SingersProgress.singer_id = Achievements.singer_id;
SELECT singer_name, metric_name, metric_description FROM SingersProgress JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON SingersProgress.singer_id = PerformanceMetrics.singer_id ORDER BY singer_name;
SELECT * FROM Singers;
SELECT singer_name, birthdate FROM Singers WHERE singer_id = 1;
SELECT singer_name FROM Singers WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT song_title, genre FROM Songs WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_name, evaluation FROM Reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE singer_id = 1;
SELECT singer_name, birthdate FROM Singers WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT singer_name, joined_date, COUNT(performance_id) AS performance_count FROM Singers JOIN Performances ON Singers.singer_id = Performances.singer_id GROUP BY singer_name, joined_date;
SELECT song_title, genre FROM Songs WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT singer_name, achievement_description, date_achieved FROM Singers JOIN Achievements ON Singers.singer_id = Achievements.singer_id WHERE date_achieved < '2022-01-01';
